structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Requirements for accepting and dispensing legend drug or administration supplies.

text.section: No legend drug or supplies needed to administer a legend drug that are donated for use under this section may be resold.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 32, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 136, sec. 3, effective June 20, 2005.
